summary: This module supplies helper utilities for batch evaluation of recommendation models, handling data loading, argument parsing, and computing ranking-based metrics such as AUC, precision, and recall. It offers functions to generate ranked item lists using heap or sorting approaches and supports multiprocessing to speed up testing across users.
business_intent: Provide a streamlined way to assess the performance of recommendation algorithms by calculating standard evaluation metrics in a batch setting, facilitating model comparison and validation.
